fixes.name: Vega Up T
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR paramUseCustomDate = SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As])
VAR paramEndDate = SELECTEDVALUE('End Date'[Display As])
RETURN
IF(
    paramUseCustomDate,
    IF(
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Max Date Exclude] = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[EFFECTIVE_DATE],
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[NVega Up + Vega Up],
        0
    ),
    IF(
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[EFFECTIVE_DATE] = paramEndDate,
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[NVega Up + Vega Up],
        0
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau nested IF into DAX using VARs for parameter values. Replaced [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] and [Parameters].[End Date] with SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As]) and SELECTEDVALUE('End Date'[Display As]) respectively. All column references were transformed to the 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Column] format. Created as a measure because the formula references parameters.
